channel.title: Code4it.dev on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Code4it.dev on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Davide's Code and Architecture Notes - Web APIs vs REST APIs vs pseudo-REST APIs
item.description: When describing a web service, people often use the wrong terms. Are you really creating a REST API, or is it some sort of pseudo-REST? Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/architecture-notes/webapi-vs-rest-vs-pseudo-rest/

item.title: Davide's Code and Architecture Notes - Web APIs vs REST APIs vs RESTful APIs
item.description: When describing a web service, people often use the wrong terms. Are you really creating a REST API if all your operations are executed via POST? Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/architecture-notes/webapi-vs-rest-vs-restful/
